I have fixed this by creating and passing the DummyFunction below instead of nullptr here:
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/autograd/engine.cpp#L262

struct DummyFunction : public Function {
  virtual variable_list apply(const variable_list& inputs) {
    return outputs;
  };

  variable_list outputs;
};

I forgot to mention that this segfault appears only when I use torch.utils.checkpoint feature.
